replies.body: Gj riot. i feel like u have been getting sloppy on lores so im glad u added this in (refering to all the new shirma lores which are like a coupe lines and kalista/azir lore, they are nothing like vel'coz/braum lore which is long and discriptive) also he seems like a strong laner or jungler. keep up the good work
btw, Rek'Sai is female
This lore wasn't bad, you got a whole story, feels and all! You realize there are multiple pages right?
He was saying he liked this one...
btw she also is a jungler

"this creatures unspeakable horror" shutup Rek'sai is my beautiful flower...

He can be like Pheonix Wright on Marvel Vs Capcom. Hes playable but so fucking garbage he should be patched out.

In Noxus they value strength in all its forms. If Aelon couldn't court his love, it was because her or her family were stronger than him or his family. She or the man she is allowed to court are better candidates for new champions than Aelon (although it's certainly nice to see new lore).
awww, the ending is so sweet.
